heading: Professional, Playful, and Minimalistic
sub-heading:
Professional, playful, and minimalistic are words that I want my website to reflect.

Having a professional website is essential because it allows me to highlight my skills, experiences, and achievements in a way that is easy to access and read. Additionally, my website gives me a platform to share my work, thoughts, and ideas with a wider audience. It is also aplace for others to learn more about me and be a part of my journey to becoming a web developer.
